title: Rust Rewrite: genesis-gsd-planner
description: Port the genesis-gsd-planning Node.js CLI (5,033 lines across 11 modules) to a Rust binary. Targets: macOS ARM, macOS x86_64, Linux x86_64. Distribution via cargo-binstall + GitHub releases. Replaces npm/Node.js entirely.

title: P0: Project scaffold — Cargo workspace, CI, cross-compilation
description: Create new repo genesis-gsd-planner. Cargo.toml with clap, serde, serde_json, serde_yml. GitHub Actions CI for macOS ARM + x86_64, Linux x86_64. cargo-binstall metadata. Release profile (opt-level=z, lto, strip). Rust 2024 edition.

title: P9: Content embedding — commands, workflows, agents as assets
description: Decide and implement content distribution: embed markdown files (commands/, workflows/, agents/) via include_str!/include_bytes! at compile time, OR ship as sidecar assets extracted on install. 31 commands, 33 workflows, 11 agents. Install script that extracts to ~/.claude/ etc.
close_reason: Completed: P9 content embedding committed as 8847948

title: P10: Test port — behavioral tests from Node.js test suite
description: Port 156 tests from Node.js node:test suite to Rust. Use assert_cmd for CLI integration tests, tempfile for temp dirs. Tests are the behavioral spec — Rust output must match Node.js output exactly (JSON schema compatibility). Property-based tests with proptest for frontmatter parser.
close_reason: Completed: P10 test port committed as 4b61260

title: P11: Distribution — GitHub Actions release, cargo-binstall, install script
description: GitHub Actions release workflow: build on tag push for 3 targets (aarch64-apple-darwin, x86_64-apple-darwin, x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu). Upload binaries to GitHub releases. cargo-binstall metadata in Cargo.toml. curl one-liner install script. Checksums + signing.
close_reason: Completed: P11 distribution committed as fd7a03c

title: P1: Core module — output helpers, config loading, path resolution
description: Port core.cjs (411 lines): output() JSON/raw dispatch, error() with process exit, loadConfig() from .planning/config.json, git utilities (resolveProjectRoot, getCurrentBranch), phase utilities (normalizePhaseName, comparePhaseNum, findPhaseDir), model resolution (MODEL_PROFILES table, resolveModel). All functions are pure/deterministic — ideal Rust port targets.
close_reason: Completed: P1 core module committed as 67a104c

title: P2: State engine — STATE.md operations (14 functions)
description: Port state.cjs (521 lines): cmdStateSnapshot, cmdStateGet, cmdStatePatch, cmdStateUpdate, cmdAdvancePlan, cmdRecordMetric, cmdUpdateProgress, cmdResolveBlocker, cmdRecordSession, cmdAddDecision, cmdAddBlocker, cmdStateLoad. Markdown parsing/mutation of STATE.md sections. Field extraction via regex. Table row insertion.
close_reason: Completed: P2 state engine committed as d612127

title: P3: Phase operations — CRUD, numbering, completion
description: Port phase.cjs (~870 lines): cmdFindPhase, cmdPhasesList, cmdPhasePlanIndex, cmdPhaseComplete, cmdPhaseAdd, cmdPhaseInsert, cmdPhaseRemove (most complex — regex renumbering across dirs/files/markdown), cmdNextDecimal. Phase numbering with decimal/letter-suffix support.
close_reason: Completed: P3 phase operations committed as ac5ba13

title: P4: Frontmatter engine — YAML subset parser
description: Port frontmatter.cjs (299 lines): Hand-rolled YAML parser. parseFrontmatter, updateFrontmatter, parseMustHavesBlock (hardcoded indent levels 4/6/8/10). Known fragility hotspot. Rust rewrite should use serde_yml for proper YAML parsing instead of hand-rolling. 8 exported functions. This is the hardening opportunity.
close_reason: Completed: P4 frontmatter engine committed as e427f8e

title: P5: Roadmap operations — ROADMAP.md parsing and mutation
description: Port roadmap.cjs: cmdRoadmapGetPhase (section extraction by heading), cmdRoadmapAnalyze (parse phases with goals, deps, disk status). Checkbox summary list + detail sections dual representation.
close_reason: Completed: P5 roadmap operations committed as 80eda65

title: P6: Verify suite — consistency, health, summary validation
description: Port verify.cjs (772 lines, 9 exported functions): cmdVerifySummary (frontmatter schema validation), cmdValidateConsistency (roadmap vs disk cross-check), cmdValidateHealth (comprehensive project health). Silent try/catch blocks to be replaced with proper Result<T,E> error handling.
close_reason: Completed: P6 verify suite committed as 6c8de57

title: P7: Milestone, template, config, init, commands modules
description: Port remaining modules: milestone.cjs (215 lines, archival + requirements lifecycle), template.cjs (template rendering), config.cjs (config ensure-section), init.cjs (context file collection for plan-phase/execute-phase/progress/phase-op), commands.cjs (list-todos, todo-complete). Smaller modules, straightforward ports.
close_reason: Completed: P7 remaining modules committed as 8e979d7

title: P8: CLI router — clap dispatch replacing gsd-tools.cjs
description: Port gsd-tools.cjs (585 lines): CLI arg parsing, command dispatch, --raw/--cwd/--json flags. Replace hand-rolled arg parsing with clap derive. Single binary entry point. @file: protocol for large outputs (>50KB). process.exit() semantics → std::process::exit().
close_reason: Completed: P8 CLI router committed as fd95134
